name: places/ChIJy6xraLBYwokRjGp2Me5YIDE
formattedAddress: 1675 York Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1675 York Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: Howard is an incredible asset to my business.  He does his work thoroughly and quickly and gives excellent advice.  I've recommended him to countless friends and colleagues over the years and they have all been extremely happy with his services.  When I first started working with Howard years ago, I remember he noticed that the state of California had withheld taxes for a project I had done in the state.  He was able to get back almost $1000 for me in these withheld taxes.  My colleague who I had worked with on the project lost that same $1000, because his accountant did not bother to file the necessary paperwork to get back the withheld taxes.  This is just one example of the dedication and extra mile that Howard always does to give the best services to his clients, which end up paying for themselves in the money he is able to save.  So grateful to Howard for his support and help over the years.

originalText.text: I have used Howard's services for the last 4 years. He is professional and most considerate of my deficiencies in understanding the minutiae of my complicated returns. He is easy-going and friendly, and his response times are phenomenal! This combination allows me to feel as stress-free as possible regarding my taxes and other financial matters.  Very easy to work with: Highly recommend

originalText.text:
Howard Wurzel has been our adviser for many years and we have built a very close working relationship. Howard have a great understanding of my needs. He is very knowledgeable and courteous to assist when we have a problem or need assistance. We feel very comfortable when dealing Howard Wurzel and look forward to dealing with him for many years to come.

Melissa Deleen

originalText.text: Howard came recommended by a friend and we’ve been filing taxes through him for years. For most of us who are not financial experts, it’s great to have someone like him giving me general financial advice and prep for next year. I’m grateful for him and the time not spent scratching my heads and double-triple checking my numbers.

originalText.text:
We worked with Howard on our 2020 tax return - that year we moved from California to New York, and had liquidated stocks. Our experience with Howard was horrible; he was rude, impatient, and continuously gave us unsolicited financial advice.
We tolerated him because we thought he would at least get the job done. Not until when we were filing our 2021 tax return we found out that Howard miscalculated part of our 2020 tax. When We followed up with him because my current CPA asked for missing documents, he called my CPA a 'loser' for accusing him for misfiling. When I gave him the exact document that was missing, he then went on radio silence.
We later on got ANOTHER CPA to look at our 2020 tax return, and this CPA again CONFIRMED Howard has missed a document. Because of Howard's mistake and our inability to get the document, multiple CPAs refused to work with us.
We called and emailed him multiple times, and he continued to ignore our requests.

Howard was unprofessional, clearly made a mistake and did not attempt to fix it. I would not recommend him to anyone. Save yourself from repeating the same mistake as ours.
